original_text: And Samuel said to the people, “The Lord is witness, who appointed Moses and Aaron and brought your fathers up out of the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 사무엘이 백성에게 이르되 모세와 아론을 세우시며 너희 조상들을 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내신 이는 여호와이시니

sentences.original_text: And Samuel said to the people,
and brought your fathers up out of the land of Egypt.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 조상들을 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내셨음이라.
